title: Dataset on the physical characterization of biopolymer coated magnetic nanoparticles.
abstract: The data presented in this article is related to the research article entitled "Paclitaxel loaded magnetic nanocomposites with folate modified chitosan/carboxymethyl surface; a vehicle for imaging and targeted drug delivery" (S. Bano, M. Afzal, M.M. Waraich, K. Alamgir, S. Nazir, 2016) [1]. It contains the absorbance spectra, band gap energies of pure nickel-ferrite nano cores (NFs), and calibration curve of Paclitaxel. Thermal stability analysis of pure NFs, chitosan (CS) and carboxymethyl cellulose (CMC)-conjugated NFs samples is also included in the data.

authors.name: Shazia Bano
affiliations: Department of Physics, The Islamia University of Bahawalpur, Pakistan; Nanosciences and Technology Department (NSTD), National Centre for Physics (NCP), Islamabad, Pakistan.

authors.name: Muhammad Afzal
affiliations: Department of Physics, The Islamia University of Bahawalpur, Pakistan.
